title: Aledari Heavy Weapons Technical Analysis
text:
Aeldari heavy weapons are a set of 5 weapons that have been part of many Aeldari (or Eldar way before) since 3rd edition. They’ve been part of some of the most iconic model kits of the faction.


War Walkers, Wraithlord, Falcons, Wave Serpents and Guardians Defenders all can choose one or more of the following weaponry:
